title: You think I am joking about the shit in bronze?

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body: This, this pretty much sums it up.

replies.body:
Bronze is the bottom of the barrel. Stop being surprised that you find the worst players there.

Eh, does Nasus normally build like that?

No, normally I would go a bit tankier, but since I was smashing them I thought why not. Helped end the game before 20 minutes.

Now the problem is, that there is so much shit down there that even though I can get games like this, I can't seem to get out. Looking at that game, I get regular games like that, but still get loses. I even get them S scorecard loses, how? Fucked if I know.

If you don't already, I suggest checking out Trick2g and Sirhcez on Twitch. They run Udyr/Nasus split pushing jungle/top, and their strategy basically has nothing to do with the rest of the team. They win whether their team sucks or not because they focus on pushing towers instead of just racking up kills.
That still takes 2, I am solo and wish Rito would make a SOLO queue, not a "Let's group this solo with 2 premade teams who start hating on each other".
They are actually going to introduce a Solo only Ranked queue. But I'm actually not sure about OCE. Will have to wait for updates on that.
If that is true it would be good and bad.

obvious reason to brag on boards is obvious. you dont gain coolness points for building hydra on nasus, and if you're not just trying to look cool then you actually think hydra is a good item on nasus which makes you stupid

There's the good bronze and the other "Bronze" sorry typo, I mean garbage who try to play rank than blame there team when they lose or just say the champion there vising is "broken" cause they don't know what counter play is. e.g. I picked {{champion:150}} and my top laner who is picking after  me, picks {{champion:122}} ? they just yell out that they don't know About kitting and they either start roaming, because there to far behind. and than they get them selfs killed and there laners because I'm fed and I come down to help.

Honestly, I have not come across very many normal bronze players, most of the ones I get are rat shit, the odd good ones I do get end up like my last game. I had a good Fizz and a c*** of a Yi plus 2 AFK. Yi refused to surrender and didn't really know how to play, along with the enemy purposely stalling the game, I get 28 minutes of shit and yet ANOTHER promo game lost for something I could do nothing about.
